statusLine.command: input=$(cat); printf "\033[2m%s@%s \033[0m\033[2m%s\033[0m" "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed "s|$HOME|~|")"; if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); printf " \033[2m(%s" "$branch"; [ "$status" != "0" ] && printf "*%s" "$status"; printf ")\033[0m"; fi; printf " \033[2m[%s]\033[0m" "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')"
